snippet.title: Build a Chess Game in Ren'Py!
snippet.description:
GitHub: https://github.com/RuolinZheng08/renpy-chess

itch.io: https://r3dhummingbird.itch.io/renpy-chess-game


This is a demo of a chess game engine I built for the Ren'Py Visual Novel Game Development engine. You can play against another player or the computer, with different difficulty levels. Enjoy!



BGM Credit (Copyright free): https://soundcloud.com/audiolounge1/happy-childrens-background-music-youtube-videos-kids-popular-songs-royalty-free-music


#renpy #visualnovel #gamedev #opensource #sourcecode
